Meet [AM Name], your LegalZoom Account Manager.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for speaking with me about your limited liability company formation order. This email is confirming your attorney consultation, scheduled for [MONTH/DATE] at [TIME - TIME/ TIME ZONE]. You will be speaking with [ATTORNEY NAME]. If you haven’t already done so, please log into your account and accept the Terms of Service. The attorney consultation cannot proceed until this is complete.
As part of the Business Legal Plan, you can consult with the attorney for free for 30 minutes. Some topics that may be helpful to discuss include:
-- The best business structure for your company -- How to prepare for future business growth, such as adding employees or expanding into other states -- How to protect your business assets by using trademarks, patents, and copyrights
You can keep track of your attorney consultation using our [ATTORNEY CONSULT SITE TITLE/LINK] or contacting me directly using the information below. Remember, you can schedule an unlimited number of 30 minute attorney consultations regarding new legal matters.
You may contact me directly at any time with questions about your order.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension} Account Management Services M-F 9:00 am – 6 pm CT
